text: While you threaten a creature in melee (meaning, you could hit it with a melee weapon attack), the creature suffers a -2 Distraction Malus to Dodge (As well as maximum and minimum Dodge) against any attacks against it, as long as the target creature isn't able to see you and the attacker at the same time (meaning, if it's line of vision can not cover both of you at the same time)
The malus is now -{{conditionalText[1]}} Distraction malus.
